bullets.one: Our welcome offer is valid only once, you may choose one of the two available options.
bullets.two: You may cancel your booking up to 24 hours before the class start. After that, the credits will be deducted. (for class packs).
bullets.three: For your comfort and safety, grip socks are required during all sessions.
